availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. B. Welch (Carter County, Kentucky, grocer merchant)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, merchant and grocer. North Carolina native. Married Cassandra Drake Welch in Carter County on July 12, 1857. Father of Susan F. Welch. Merchant and grocer in Carter County, Kentucky in 1860. Fined for illegally selling liquor in Greenup County, Kentucky in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 249.
